name: Pyroar
flavorText:
The male with the largest mane of fire
is the leader of the pride.

previous.name: Litleo
previous.flavorText:
The stronger the opponent it faces,
the more heat surges from its mane
and the more power flows through its body.

next.name: Flabébé
next.flavorText:
It draws out and controls the hidden power
of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds
is most likely part of its body.
next.formDescription: Forms only differ in appearance.  Flabébé's flower is set when it is encountered, and cannot be changed.

the more heat surges from its mane
and the more power flows through its body.
